version_description:
Thank you for using Call Recorder!

In this update we've bring you full Siri support including:
- Shortcuts managment
- Spotlight search and suggestions

Stay with us and wait for the next great update!

Thank you for using Call Recorder app.

Meet the grand release!

In this update, you will find the Audio Recording Notes feature!
Added the transcribing feature to convert call and voice recordings to text. Supports over 120 languages.

We update our app regularly to enhance the value and performance.
Stay with us and wait for the next update!

Thank you for using our app!
In this version, we improved app performance and stability.
Stay with us and wait for new great updates!

Thank you for using our app!

In this version we improved:
- cloud performance: now you can download you files faster;

- user account management;

Also in this update we improved app performance and stability.

Stay with us and wait for new great updates!
